channel.title: Topic: marijuana
channel.description:
hi friends,
today ill be talking about marijuana and its unjustified legalization. Marijuana has been medically proven to do amazing things for your body including, relieving pain, helping depression, helping sleep disorders ETC. however, it is still illegal. alcohol is actually MORE DANGEROUS then marijuana yet is completely legal in all states. why is this you ask? this is because alcohol doesn't come in from cuba and mexico. the government made marijuana illegal during the large drug affair in the 1900's (i don't remember the exact years). however, if marijuana was legal this would not be an issue. for instance, look at california. it may be doing horrible financially but it has less patience with chronic pain and depression due to its legalization of medical marijuana. i strongly believe that marijuana SHOULD be legalized for both medical AND recreational purposes...
leave a comment below if you feel like it!

item.title: Topic: marijuana
item.dc:creator: @jme jme
item.description:
@jme wrote:

[quote="(Anthony), post:54, topic:417658"][quote author=m.dog311 link=topic=520211.msg3784373#msg3784373 date=1318735640]
Well in that case, I can say you’re bastardizing the English language and he is just lazy.
[/quote]

how is that so? my lack of capitalization doesn’t change the meaning of what’s being said, his use of “to” in the place of “too” does.[/quote]

Correlating marijuana and his use of “to” instead of “too” is equally retarded… But who gives a shit

locked

Read full topic

item.title: Topic: marijuana
item.dc:creator: @Pzezima2 Pzezima2
item.description:
@Pzezima2 wrote:

[quote=“m.dog311, post:20, topic:417658”][quote author=ziplock link=topic=520211.msg3777668#msg3777668 date=1318207667]

If they do decide to legalize marijuana, what would the age limit be?

Well they already have synthetic Marijuana, and the age restriction on that is just 18. “Super Kush” which is a synthetic, gives you a 6 hour high and it’s as close to a Marijuana high as you can get. There are absolutely no studies on it and it’s labeled “Not for human consumption”. If that is legal, why can’t Marijuana be?

inb4 I’m just a stoner defending Marijuana.

Side note, I don’t smoke anything.
[/quote]
Synthetic marijuana is also 99999999999999x worse for you than actual marijuana.[/quote]

Read full topic

item.title: Topic: marijuana
item.dc:creator: @n33bz0rpl0x `Aaron
item.description:
@n33bz0rpl0x wrote:

[quote=“jme, post:36, topic:417658”][quote author=(Anthony) link=topic=520211.msg3777872#msg3777872 date=1318218468]
why is it that you stupid faggots think the legalization of marijuana is an important topic of discussion?
[/quote]

Because, at least in my country, the majority have used marijuana in the last month. And we don’t want to go to jail for it?

Rightfully I believe it should be legalized. But currently I have the oppurtunity (if i wanted to) to water some plants and make as much money as a doctor. Even funnier, is growing hydroponic which results in better weed and you don’t even have to water them yourself! Say no to legalization :D[/quote]

I’d be out of a job if it was legalized, I wouldn’t grow though my parents can keep doing that shit.

Read full topic

item.title: Topic: marijuana
item.dc:creator: @jme jme
item.description:
@jme wrote:

`SJ_:

We already have a big enough issue with drunk drivers, and our governments already spend enough money on trying to fix the problem. The last thing we need is stoned idiots driving.

Driving stoned is already illegal. Driving impaired on anything is. And there are road tests where a police officer can decide you are unfit to drive, even if they can’t prove which substance.

But this has nothing to do with legalization. Why would stoned drivers increase if it was legalized? People who don’t smoke weed now, won’t start if it’s legalized (history has showed us that prohibition has never worked and stops no one). People who don’t drive stoned right now, aren’t going to start when its legalized.

[quote=“noobofiyer, post:37, topic:417658”]Beer, is best. Fuck smokin, just drink. i drink over 30+ every weekend.

GF smokin[/quote]

30+ beers a weekend? While this may be normal for many people, it is actually very harmful. Each time you drink 30 beers you risk dying and without a doubt you are causing long term damage to many organs. Brain damage, liver damage…

Of course smoking weed isn’t too good for the lungs. But it should be noted that theres never been a documented case of lung cancer because of marijuana. Or emphysema, etc

I like beer too, dont get me wrong. I use pot for entirely different purposes then beer. Beer is for going out socializing/having fun
Marijuana is chilling with buddies on a rainy day, playing video games.

Read full topic

item.title: Topic: marijuana
item.dc:creator: @sppt sppt
item.description:
@sppt wrote:

One of the reasons it’s made illegal is because a lot of industries benefit from it being illegal, the hemp plant can replace a huge amount of products (think biodegradable plastics, oil, cotton, paper and quite some more stuff), and it would be cheaper than the alternatives.
Should it ever be legalized, all of those industries would just collapse, because hemp grows everywhere, and this’d mean a huge loss of income.

Read full topic
